document_data.name: Kyristan's Malevolent Tentacles
document_data.mainbody: '''''Kyristan's malevolent tentacles''''' was an [[arcane]] [[necromancy]] spell that summoned [[negative energy|negative]]-attuned tentacles, similar to the spell ''[[Evard's black tentacles]]''. Like all magic whose power came from the [[Negative Energy plane|negative energy plane]], they could drain the life force from living and heal and bolster the [[undead]].
